title: Goodness Me - Burlington
description: Natural food market with several locations. Stocks some vegan products in addition to other natural groceries, organic produce, supplements, and personal care products Has a deli and bakery with small seating area. Moved into a larger space July 2012, and now has the Goodness Eatery, including salad bar, hot tray, and smoothie bar, as well as an indoor and outdoor eating area. Previously located in a different location on Fairview St.
